Description:
Improvement Notice served,

The cattle race where it is connected to the JAE Cattle Crush is attached with baler twine. This material is not strong enough to withstand force exerted by cattle movement on the gate & twine, and may lead it to snap or break. It should be replaced by a stronger substantial fastening such as strong rope, a chain & lock or other strong fastening.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that your consumer unit containing your electrical trip switches located in your barn is of such construction as to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, danger.
